r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $940.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Composition Ste Foy. The average
  contract duration was 1.14 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $185.0K. The longest
  contract was 3.71 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $952.2K.
lookup_name: 'COMPOSITION STE FOY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '940.5K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '20'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '35%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '91%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.71'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.3M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.14'
s421_mean_contract_value: '185.0K'
s425_max_duration: '3.71'
s422_max_contract_value: '952.2K'
